issue.title: SHOP direct download uses redirections (with SEO), not supported by clients
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

SHOP direct download (single product or grid) uses re directions (HTTP 303), this is not well supported by clients (cURL, Wget, FME...) specially in conjunction with basic authentication.
We must use the final download URL in views, and avoid redirecting afterwards.

Link example : http[s]://[joomla]/index.php?option=com_easysdi_shop&task=download.download&id=[prodId]&featurecode=[code]

**Fixed versions :** 4.5.0
